content:
How Panda3D Stores Vertices and Geometry

This section describes the structure and interconnections of Panda3D's internal vertex and geometry data objects, in general terms. You should read through this section carefully, so that you have a good understanding of Panda3D's data structures, before attempting to read the section about generating procedural data.

geomvertexdata geomvertexformat geomprimitive geom geomnode boundingvolume
